modName: Fairy Tail Follower and Race overhaul
summary: Play as a Dragon Slayer and have Fairy Tail Followers!
descriptionHtml:
WITH THE NEXT UPDATE THE EARLIER VERSIONS WILL BECOME OBSOLETE AND INCOMPATIBLE!!!!!!
Thanks for your patience,

TennoKage







Server's Working Now!
Fixed Door Not Working!

Included in this mod:

Dragon Slayer Races
Fire Dragon Slayer (scaled and unscaled)
Frost Dragon Slayer (scaled and unscaled)
Lightning Dragon Slayer(scaled)
Poison Dragon Slayer (scaled)
Shadow Dragon Slayer (scaled)
White Dragon Slayer(scaled)
Sky Dragon Slayer(scaled)
Iron Dragon Slayer (scaled)

Fairy Tail Guild Hall Located outside Whiterun by Pelagia Farm
Tenrou Cavern
Mavis' Grave
Fairy Hills

NPC's 
Mirajane Strauss, Bartender
Makarov Dreyar, Guildmaster
Max Alors, Gift Shop Seller
Romeo Conbolt
Happy, Exceed
Carle, Exceed
Lyra, Bard

Followers
Natsu Doraguniru, Uses custom Fire Dragon Magic
Gray Fullbuster, Uses Frost Dragon Slaying magic
Erza Scarlett, Swordsmaster with a custom sword
Lucy Heartfilia, Summoner
Juvia Lockser, uses Steam magic
Bisca Connell, uses bows
Nab Lazaro, uses Animal control magic
Gildarts Clive, uses incinerate magic
Wendy Marvel, uses support magic
Laxus Dreyar, uses custom Lightning dragon slaying magic
Mistgun, uses illusion staffs
.... and Many more!

Custom Tattoos
Laxus lightning
Scales
Fairy tail mark on cheek

Custom Magic
Fairy Sphere- Purely a defense/ Healing spell
Fairy Law- Eliminates or severely maims all nearby enemies, but not friends
Fairy Glitter- causes stars to rain from the sky
Each Dragon Slayer race has its own special magics that you can only have if you play as that race

Custom Clothes
Fairy Tail Robes
Natsu Robes
Gray Robes
Erza Armor- Female only
Gramps Clothes- Male only

Eyes
Dragon eyes  with 8 different colors

Hair colors
Changes the default hair colors so everyone in Skyrim will have Fairy Tail color Hair!

Custom Book describing a history of Dragon Slayers in Skyrim!

Real Fairy Tail Music in the Guild Hall!!!!


Required Mods:
CBBE Bodies (Absolutely mandatory) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Apachii Sky Hairs (Absolutely Mandatory) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Better Males (absolutely mandatory) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?
I opt for the nevernude version, its what I used 


Coming Soon:
Quests
Ice Make Magic
Beast Form Magic
Fire Dragon/ Lightning Dragon combo spells
Custom Doomstone (mavis's grave will actually have a spell)
Custom Laxus and Mistgun armor
Better Fairy Hills
Map Marker
CLOTHES ON CARLE
Acnologia
Purple boars pulling carts
Player home

Suggested Mods to use in conjunction:
Bickslows Robes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5875/?
Give Lucy a weapon: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46902/?
Fairy Tail Music Replacer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34322/?

Sometimes there is a glitch where the body turns black. Reload the game and it should go away.
author: TennoKage
